{include "affiliate_loader"} Stand in solidarity against racial injustice in WV and across the country. {include "pre-header-spacing"}{beacon}
Join Us

{include "default_salutation"} –

In response to recent events throughout the country, West Virginians are coming together in solidarity against racial injustice. Join us as we honor those recently lost including Ahmaud Abery, Breonna Taylor, George Floyd, and Tony McDade, acknowledge racist incidents like Christian Cooper's encounter in Central Park, and discuss how we heal and move forward for progress.

Hear from speakers including:

  • Delegate Sammi Brown (District 65)
  • Peshka Calloway (Black Lives Matter WV)
  • Jerry Carr (NAACP)
  • Ash Cutright (Morgantown Pride)
  • Jason Davis (Kyumei Ju Jitsu LLC)
  • Delegate Sean Hornbuckle (District 16)
  • Mollie Kennedy (ACLU-WV)
  • Rosemary Ketchum (Wheeling City Council Candidate Ward 3)
  • Tina Gray-Russel (Candidate for HOD District 27)
  • Audra Slocum (Associate Professor of English Education, WVU)
  • Stephen Smith (Candidate for Governor)
  • Delegate Danielle Walker (District 51)
  • Jennifer Wells (Our Future WV)

This will be a virtual rally held online for the safety of all participants. Please visit the facebook event page or our website event page for further details. We hope you will be part of this important moment of remembrance, healing, and progress. Please wear a black shirt in solidarity.

Onward Together

ACLU of {affiliate_name}
